data.text:
You were all fired up during training again today, Suzuka-san! 
Trainer-san seemed really enthusiastic too!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
Yeah, I also want to aim higher, 
since Trainer-san wants to see that too.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: Also, I'm entering the [Takarazuka Kinen] next.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Air Groove-san is participating too, isn't she? Finally, a 
showdown between rivals~! I'll definitely come cheer for you!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
…Oh, that's right! Suzuka-san, I'll give you 
another massage today! We can't have your fatigue 
carrying over in to tomorrow, after all!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
Hyaa~… Suzuka-san, your legs are as stiff as boards! 
I'm gonna have to massage the heck out of them!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
No matter how much I run, it always 
feels like I can keep on going…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Whenever I'm running, I get the feeling that I'm not alone. Like 
there's a gentle push on my back that keeps guiding me forward.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Spe-chan, everyone in ＜Sirius＞… and Trainer-san too, 
I wonder if it's because of all of you supporting me.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Ehehe…! We'll all keep continuing to support 
Suzuka-san! That's why, Suzuka-san, keep showing 
us lots of your awesome running!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
Alright! I'll keep massaging until your legs 
are all soft and squishy! I'll show you the 
strength I've built up from milking cows!
data.name: Special Week

data.text: C-cows…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Silence Suzuka had a stunning victory during [Kinko Sho]. 
Even after that, her condition continued to improve.

For the sake of her next challenge, the [Takarazuka Kinen], 
I was headed to the training course when-
(rustle rustle)
(Eh…? W-what's going on…?! Why's it suddenly so dark…?!)
data.name: <username>

data.text: (Eh…? W-what's going on…?! Why's it suddenly so dark…?!)
data.name: <username>

data.text: Heave-ho, Heave-ho.
(Ehh, I'm being carried…? My mind can't keep up?!)
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Welcome, Trainer. 
I sincerely welcome you.
W-…Where am I?! Who are you…?!
data.name: <username>

data.text: W-…Where am I?! Who are you…?!
data.name: <username>

data.text:
My name is Agnes Tachyon. I just really wanted to have a chat, 
so I decided to have you accompany me.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
A thin smile floated on to the lips of this Uma 
Musume named Agnes Tachyon. That burlap sack by 
her feet- did she carry me here in that?

A thin smile floated on to the lips of this Uma 
Musume named Agnes Tachyon. That burlap sack by 
her feet- did she carry me here in that?

Suspicious is a bit rude. While I agree I was perhaps a little 
rough, I do have a proper reason for inviting you here.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
Truthfully, in regards to you and your disciple, Silence 
Suzuka-kun, I wanted to have a chat and ask a few questions.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text: A chat with us?
data.name: <username>

data.text: A chat with us?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Yes. Have you ever, at times, taken a moment 
to consider what kind of existence "Uma Musume" are?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
For example, have you ever wondered why, even 
though they are very similar to humans, they 
have much higher physical abilitiles?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
Uma Musume still have many, many mysteries like that hidden 
within them. You see, I wish to unravel those mysteries, and so 
I continue to research these so called Uma Musume.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
…the mysteries of Uma Musume and 
what kind of relationship they have to humans?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
…the mysteries of Uma Musume and 
what kind of relationship they have to humans?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
With that exceptional speed, carrying herself from 
start to finish in such a way- What you are trying 
to achieve, has truly peaked my curiousity!
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
If she continues like this and perfects that style, 
that could be enough to push us Uma Musume to the next stage.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
For this running-style hence unknown to Uma Musume 
to progress, are you both fully prepared? That 
is certainly what I would like to hear.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
…so what you are saying is, you are 
just doing extremely normal things?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
It's not like we're doing any special training, 
and we're not doing anything unreasonable either.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
So you are not doing any super-human-like physical 
training, so that unknown running style we have glimpsed 
is just Suzuka-kun's unique qualities-
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
No, maybe we should start by thinking that some spiritual aspect 
is starting to have an effect on her physical body…
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text: Some spiritual aspect…?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Have you never heard this? Uma Musume are living 
beings who bear many "feelings" as they run.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
In the central plaza, that 3 Goddess statue. Concerning that 
statue, there is a belief that it is a place where Uma Musume 
inherit these "feelings".
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
As a researcher, you may think it is an improper idealogy to 
entertain, however, I myself, am an Uma Musume-
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
There are times while I am running where I can feel it, this 
sensation of some unknown presence pushing me forward.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
The things Agnes Tachyon is talking about, could they possibly be 
the hopes and support that Uma Musume respond to…?

No, pardon me… that is not the main issue at hand. But, if 
that is the case, it seems my plans are slightly off base.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
If I am correct, the future you both are 
bound for is… a little frightening.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
The running-style you two are aiming for is a big unknown. 
It is possible that it might be something outside the 
limits of what an Uma Musume can do.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text: In that case, at that time her legs…
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
The rest of those words never left Agnes Tachyon's lips. 
But what followed was definitely-
…will fail. Is that what you're saying?
data.name: <username>

data.text: …will fail. Is that what you're saying?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
I do not know. I'm merely speculating about one possibility. 
Whether there is truly a limit or not, I do not know that either.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
Like I told you at the beginning, Uma Musume are beings rife with 
mysteries. If I have made you feel uneasy, I apologize.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
At any rate, in regards to you and Suzuka-kun's astounding 
running-style- I have high hopes that you will show me what is in 
store for the next stage of Uma Musume.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text: Alllllright, next I'll be doing slope training, okay?
data.name: Winning Ticket

data.text:
I'm also doing slope training, and after 
that is straight line running, right?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: Silence Suzuka is diligently training.

The contents of that training seems normal, 
no different from a normal Uma Musume.

But, her running-style is by no means normal, it's one-of-a-kind. 
What awaits at the end of that path-

The running-style you two are aiming for is a big unknown. 
It is possible that it might be something outside the 
limits of what an Uma Musume can do.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text: Trainer-san…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Oh, uh yeah. 
Slope and straight line dashes are fine.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Oh, uh yeah. 
Slope and straight line dashes are fine.
data.name: <username>

data.text: Then, I'll be off.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: Silence Suzuka's running style, is the ideal for Uma Musume.

A running-style that nobody else could realize, but put another 
way, a running style that only she can realize-
(Does that mean she'll eventually reach beyond the limits…?)
data.name: <username>

data.text: (Does that mean she'll eventually reach beyond the limits…?)
data.name: <username>

data.text:
A slight uneasiness began to fill my heart, 
I desperately tried not to think about it.
